title: RansomEye Topology Edge
description: Frozen schema for topology edges. All fields are mandatory. No optional fields allowed.

edge_id.description: Unique identifier for this edge (UUID v4)

source_id.description: Source node identifier (asset, service, or network device)

target_id.description: Target node identifier (asset, service, or network device)

discovered_at.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of edge discovery

immutable_hash.description: SHA256 hash of edge record (immutability guarantee)
